metadata.title: PM Shehbaz condemns bomb blast in Turbat

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jan 04 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday strongly condemned a remote controlled bombA blast in a bus in Turbat. The prime minister prayed that may Allah, The Almighty, elevate the ranks ofA the martyrs ofA the incident and expressed sympathies with their families. The prime minister also prayed forA early recovery of the injured. Shehbaz Sharif said that terrorists would not succeed in their nefarious designs, adding that theA government and security forces were taking action against terrorists. He said the government was determined to root out terrorism from the country.
content.summary: Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif condemned a bomb blast in Turbat. He expressed sympathies for the families of the victims and prayed for the injured. Sharif stated the government is determined to eliminate terrorism.
